name: Youthful Folly
description: The Gate of Formulization - Mental pressure to resolve or answer questions through pattern recognition

channel.name: Logic
channel.description: The Channel of Logic - A Design of a Mental Ease Mixed with Doubt

signal.script: Your mind is seeking patterns and formulas. What question most needs your logical attention?
experiments: Write the question clearly and let it rest overnight
Map the problem visually to see connections
Research existing frameworks that might apply

friction.trigger: Stuck in mental loops without resolution
friction.script: Not all questions need immediate answers. Some patterns reveal themselves through lived experience. Can you hold the question lightly?
experiments: Set a timer for thinking, then consciously release it
Test theories through small experiments rather than pure thought
Share the question with others to gain new perspectives

breakpoint.trigger: Overwhelmed by doubt and mental confusion
breakpoint.script: The doubt you feel is actually your mind's integrityâ€”refusing false clarity. Real understanding is emerging beneath the noise.
experiments: Practice 'I don't know' as a complete sentence
Focus on what you DO understand clearly
Ground mental energy through physical activity
